title: Exquisite Mango Design Kasulaperu Haaram with Emerald Pendant
materials: meticulously studded with high-quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones and accented with vibrant Emeralds. Features a rich Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: This stunning Haaram showcases the timeless mango (paisley) design, known as 'Kasulaperu'. Each mango motif is intricately crafted and pav√©-set with sparkling CZ stones. The centerpiece is a graceful pendant featuring a central Emerald surrounded by CZ accents. The overall design reflects a blend of traditional South Indian artistry and modern jewelry making techniques.
colors: complemented by the brilliance of white CZ stones and the deep green hue of Emeralds. The Emerald-Gold combination is highly auspicious in South Indian tradition.
occasions: and other significant celebrations. Also suitable for making a statement at high-end social events.
description: This Haaram embodies the rich cultural heritage of South Indian jewelry. Its intricate design, coupled with the use of high-quality materials and meticulous craftsmanship, ensures both beauty and durability. The Kasulaperu design is a timeless classic, representing prosperity and good fortune. The Emerald pendant adds a touch of elegance and sophistication, making it a truly unforgettable piece.
